extractFactDictList.question: What is the name of the cleaning that took place in the spring of this year?
Along with the Romans, what ancient culture believed in cleaning their homes?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The tradition of spring cleaning can be traced back to ancient cultures, such as the Egyptians and the Romans, who believed in cleaning their homes to purify them and drive out evil spirits.

extractFactDictList.question: When did spring cleaning become more widespread in Europe and North America?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the 19th century, the practice of spring cleaning became more widespread in Europe and North America, as people began to see it as a way to freshen up their homes after a long winter.
